Application.title: Application
Application.description: This is the Application_c record that will be updated and is the Application variable and the specific Application from the Update Application Prompt Format: 18 digit ID Input from the Update Application Prompt

BadFit.title: BadFit
BadFit.description:
Format: Text
What requirements/ Skills missing: where might this candidate possibly be missing or lacking for this specific job spec Format: Long Text The input is retrieved from the Update Application Prompt: BadFit

GoodFit.title: GoodFit
GoodFit.description:
Format: Text
What makes applicant a good fit for this specific job spec Format: Long Text The input is retrieved from the Update Application Prompt where it will say: What makes applicant a good fit

Job_Spec.title: Job_Spec
Job_Spec.description: This is the Job_Spec that the Applicant applied for, and is related to their Applicant record Format: 18 digit ID Input from the Update Application Prompt

NonNegotiables.title: NonNegotiables
NonNegotiables.description: Format: Text The input is retrieved from the Update Application Prompt where it will say: Non Negotiables These are the non negotiables as specified on the Job Spec record and whether the Candidate has all the non negotiables or not

Overview.title: Overview
Overview.description: Overview of Candidate: Give a short overview of the Candidate highlighting the number of years experience, overview of their job history, and anything else that would make this a good Format: Long Text The input is retrieved from the Update Application Prompt; Overview

Rating.title: Rating
Rating.description: Application Rating: What would you score the applicant out of ten for this Job Spec Format: Number The input is retrieved from the Update Application Prompt where it will say: Application Rating:

recordId.title: recordId
recordId.description: This is the Candidate__c record Id that applied for the Job Spec Format: 18 digit ID (not email address) Input from the Update Application Prompt Input:Application.Candidate__r.Id
